participant_1.background:
I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.
i am married and have five children.
I wish my grandpa could tell me more about his time in the service.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
i drive a big truck.

participant_2.background:
I'm a busy mom of two who is trying to find a healthy way to lose weight.
I went on a trip to Japan to research my next book.
i am a school psychologist.
I like to create my own clothes because it allows me to express myself and be unique.
i have a terrible singing voice.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. What about you?
I am doing well, thank you. I am a busy mom of five children and I love to dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.
Wow, that is a lot of children! I am a busy mom of two, myself. I also like to create my own clothes because it allows me to express myself and be unique.
That is so cool! I have always wished I could make my own clothes.
It is not too difficult, actually. There are a lot of great tutorials online that can teach you how to do it.
I might have to look into that. I love to dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality, so it would be great to be able to make my own clothes.
I think you would really enjoy it. It is a great way to be creative and make something that is truly unique.
I know what you mean. I love to make things that are special and that I can share with my children.
That is so sweet! I am sure your children love your clothes.
They do, thank you. They are always asking me to make them something new.
I bet they are really talented. You should be proud of them.
I am. They are both very bright and creative
